title: [AUTH] OAuth infrastructure - PKCE flow, callback server, token storage
description: Phase 1: src/auth/ module with oauth.rs, server.rs, storage.rs. Deps: oauth2, tiny_http, open crates

logs.msg:
Implemented OAuth infrastructure:
- Created src/auth/ module with PKCE, callback server, storage
- Added login/logout CLI commands (ion login openai, ion login google)
- Added ChatGptPlus and GoogleAi provider variants
- Integrated OAuth credentials with provider layer
- All tests pass, clippy clean
